subject: Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Graeme Mew, a lawyer who specializes in arbitration and resolving sports disputes, has been appointed to try to bring the warring French and English factions back to the negotiating table.
snippet: Graeme Mew, a lawyer who specializes in arbitration and resolving sports disputes, has been appointed to try to bring the warring French and English factions back to the negotiating table.
